Package org.jetel.data.parser

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICharByteInputReader
    Common interface for input readers providing byte input, char input or mixed char/byte input
    ICloverDataParser  
    Parser
    Interface to input data parsers
    TextParser  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractParser
    Abstract implementation of Parser interface.
    AbstractTextParser
    Abstract class for all TextParsers.
    AhoCorasick  
    BinaryDataParser
    A simple class for retrieving records from binary files created by BinaryDataFormatter Uses channels
    ByteBufferParser
    Parser of records from InputStream.
    CharByteDataParser
    A parser able to deal with mixed records containing both char-based and byte-based fields (BYTE/CBYTE)
    CharByteDataParser.ByteDelimConsumer
    Consumes a char-based delimiter that cannot be preceded by any other data
    CharByteDataParser.ByteRecordSkipper
    Record skipper for input reader that may not support char operations
    CharByteDataParser.CharDelimConsumer
    Consumes a char-based delimiter that cannot be preceded by any other data
    CharByteDataParser.CharRecordSkipper
    Record skipper for input reader that may not support byte operations
    CharByteDataParser.DelimByteFieldConsumer
    Consumes delimited byte field.
    CharByteDataParser.DelimCharFieldConsumer
    Consumes delimited char-based field
    CharByteDataParser.FixlenByteFieldConsumer
    Consumes several adjacent byte fields of fixed length.
    CharByteDataParser.FixlenCharFieldConsumer
    Consumes a char-based field of fixed length
    CharByteDataParser.InputConsumer  
    CharByteDataParser.RecordSkipper
    Attempts to skip a record.
    CharByteInputReader
    An abstract class for input readers able to provide mixed char/byte data
    CharByteInputReader.ByteInputReader
    This input reader can be used only for data inputs which don't contain any delimiters or char-based fields
    CharByteInputReader.CharInputReader
    This input reader can be used only for data inputs which don't contain any byte-based fields
    CharByteInputReader.DoubleMarkCharByteInputReader
    An ugly hack to provide support for the verbose error reporting in the parsers.
    CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader
    This implementation of the input reader should be used as last resort when none of the implementations above can be used That means it can be used for multiple byte charsets on inputs combining char-based and byte-based data fields.
    CharByteInputReader.SingleByteCharsetInputReader
    This implementation of the input reader can be used for input data combining byte-based fields and char-based fields encoded in single byte charsets
    CloverDataParser
    Class for reading data saved in Clover internal format It is predicted that zip file (with name dataFile.zip) has following structure: DATA/dataFile INDEX/dataFile.idx If data are not in zip file, indexes (if needed) have to be in the same location NOTE:Supports also deserialization of DataRecords from an input stream.
    CloverDataParser.FileConfig  
    CloverDataParser35
    Class for reading data saved in Clover internal format It is predicted that zip file (with name dataFile.zip) has following structure: DATA/dataFile INDEX/dataFile.idx If data are not in zip file, indexes (if needed) have to be in the same location NOTE:Supports also deserialization of DataRecords from an input stream.
    DataParser
    Parsing plain text data.
    DelimitedDataParser
    Parsing delimited text data.
    FixLenByteDataParser
    Parser for sequence of records represented by fixed count of bytes
    FixLenCharDataParser
    Parser for sequence of records represented by fixed count of chars.
    FixLenDataParser
    Superclass for fix-length data parsers.
    JExcelXLSDataParser
    Parsing data from a XLS file using JExcelAPI.
    JsonSaxParser  
    SimpleDataParser
    This parser is as simple as posible - limited validation, error handling, functionality - but very fast.
    TextParserConfiguration  
    TextParserFactory  
    XLSParser
    Parses data from xls file.
    XLSParser.Incremental
    For incremental reading.
    XLSXDataParser
    Represents a XLSX data parser based on the Apache POI library.
    XmlSaxParser  
    XmlSaxParser.MyHandler  
    XPathContext
    The XPathContext is class that evaluates xpaths and other xpath contexts.
    XPathElement  
    XPathElementOfXSDType  
    XPathParser
    This class is parser for Xml XPath reader.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Parser.DataSourceType
    This enumeration is used by #getPreferredDataSourceType() method to suggest preferred data source type by a Parser.
    XPathParser.SupportedDataModels  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BinaryDataParser.NoDataAvailableException
    Is thrown if no more bytes are available in current data source for requested operation.
